title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: A Blog About Functional Data Analysis
text:
Howdy.
My name is Santiago Rodriguez and I am a statistican, statistical programmer, machine learning practioner, and a life-long learner.
The purpose of this blog is to house under one roof articles and exploratory works I’ve authored about functional data analysis that are currently scattered across the internet.

title: The Power of Functional Data Analysis
text: The following work was published to Quarto Pubs (link). You can also view the work below.
